name: Catsm
description:
Cat in a chasm. The infinite falling game.

You are a cat. You feel in a chasm. You want to escape the chasm.

The exit is somewhere at the bottom of the screen.
At the top are boulders, which caved in, and are bad. You want nothing to do with them.

Boulders hurt. Exit good. Exit is where you fall on all four feet!

If you can't exit, the next best thing is to get as far as you can.

Use left and right arrow or A and D to move.

Used assets:
Cat meows by ebcrosby: https://freesound.org/people/ebcrosby/ (Creative Common Attribution License)
"Flight of Bumblebee", composed by Nikolai Rimsky-Korsakov and performed by US Army Band (Public Domain)
